de.gbv.beacon
Class BeaconException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          de.gbv.beacon.BeaconException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BeaconException
extends Exception

Encapsulate a general Beacon error or warning.

This class can contain basic error or warning information from either the Beacon parser or the Beacon handler application. Examples include invalid Beacon serialization and invalid link elements in a Beacon dump.

Author:
Jakob Voss
See Also:
